metro.GameScreen.MainView.TrainView

Class TrainViewMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.TrainView.TrainViewMain

  • public class TrainViewMain
extends GameScreen
    This dialog part shows the lines and the trains attached to them. The player can't buy a train with this dialog but can sell one.
    Author:
    hauke

        private void startMoveMode()
        Fills controls with information about line so that the player can edit it. Also disabled the buttons for editing and selling trains and sets the _movedTrain variable.

      • stopMoveMode

        Sets the move mode to false, so that no trains can be moved to other lines.
